about_the_game:
Expand the number of Void Storage in the game.

Criminal Dissidia DLC: Void Storage Expansion is additional content DLC based on Criminal Dissidia.
Void Storage is one of the deck build systems in the game. It can be used to transfer Cards to other professions. Players can store cards in the current game and withdraw them in the next new one.
This DLC can expand Void Storage for players to store more cards and create more diverse deck builds for a smoother playing experience.

Note: Void Storage will be unlocked when reach Epic lv.30.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX650
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, Ryzen 5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 and equivalent
  • Storage: 10240 MB available space
